title: Insti Foyer
text:
Insti Foyer refers to the outside entrance stairs and accompanied area, in front of the Central Library entrance, of the Main building . It is a popular spot used by different societies and clubs in IIT Kharagpur for meetups and activities. Usually, most activities are planned in the evening or late night when offices and administrative blocks are closed.
Debating Society conducting their freshers' workshop at the Foyer.
